lyrics:
Neon rosary wrapped ‘round my throat
Praying your packet loss hits me slow
404 kisses, boy, you’re not found
But I still taste you when the server’s down
Glitch in my halo, flickering light
RGB tears when I stream at night
Tip-toe through your RAM while you sleep
Dreaming in hex, baby, six-feet deep
Server down, but I’m always online
Botfarm landlord, your data’s mine
Slow render, baby, buffer in time
418, I’m a teapot, pour me, I’m fine
Velvet firewall, let you through
Quantum entangled, me and you
Lag so heavy, feel the weight
Corrupted angel at your gate
Click my link, pretty please
I just wanna watch you freeze
Blue-screen my name across your eyes
I’ll reboot you between my thighs
DDoS my heart, make it crash
Flood me, daddy, use up all the cache
Honeyed malware in your veins
Silk and static, electric chains
I’m the pop-up you can’t escape
Your favorite error, your sweetest mistake
